overview:
Neville A. Mehra is the Chief Executive Officer and President as well as a co-founder of Snoozester Inc. Mr. Mehra divides his time between overseeing Snoozester’s day-to-day operations and working with the Board of Directors to develop Snoozester’s long term plans and goals.

In addition to his work with Snoozester, Mr. Mehra continues his technology consulting practice in the Washington D.C. Metropolitan area. His consulting focus and area of expertise is business systems design and integration. Additionally, Mr. Mehra brings his years of technology experience working in a variety of industries from entertainment and hospitality to publishing and defense.
